page.title: 11RECREATION- SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: There are seven main places in the area that offer either{sport}or {recreation:}Marine Park Gardens,The Pleasure Gardens,Swansea Recreational Gardens,Rock gardens,West End Park,The Regis Centre and The Yacht Club. {Marine Park Gardens}were opened fifty years ago. The facilities that they offer are golf, a fish pond and beautiful gardens full of plants flowers and trees.They are open all day. {The Pleasure Gardens}are opened every year by the Mayor.The facilities that they offer are bowling and putting.The busiest time of the year is from June onwards.They open from 9.30am to 8.30pm. {Swansea Receational Gardens}offers bowling,three tennis courts and a garden with a bench.It is open all day.
